mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.patient_code AS "sicmedPatient.id", a.branch_code AS "sicmedBranch.id", a.doctor_code AS "sicmedUser.id", a.asked_code AS "sicmedAsked.id", a.medical_group AS "sicmedBaseCode.id", a.plus_name AS "plusName", a.send_branch AS "sicmedAskedBranch.id", a.medical_code AS "sicmedMedical.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN sicmed_patient b ON b.id = a.patient_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_branch c ON c.id = a.branch_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_user d ON d.id = a.doctor_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_asked e ON e.id = a.asked_code LEFT JOIN sicmed_base_code f ON f.id = a.medical_group LEFT JOIN sicmed_asked_branch g ON g.id = a.send_branch LEFT JOIN sicmed_medical h ON h.id = a.medical_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_patient_asked( id, patient_code, branch_code, doctor_code, asked_code, medical_group, plus_name, send_branch, medical_code, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sicmedPatient.id}, #{sicmedBranch.id}, #{sicmedUser.id}, #{sicmedAsked.id}, #{sicmedBaseCode.id}, #{plusName}, #{sicmedAskedBranch.id}, #{sicmedMedical.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_patient_asked SET patient_code = #{sicmedPatient.id}, branch_code = #{sicmedBranch.id}, doctor_code = #{sicmedUser.id}, asked_code = #{sicmedAsked.id}, medical_group = #{sicmedBaseCode.id}, plus_name = #{plusName}, send_branch = #{sicmedAskedBranch.id}, medical_code = #{sicmedMedical.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
